2+1.sig_info: Brother Daniel will possess either Doctor Voodoo or his opponent moving between them based on Doctor Voodoo's combo meter when he uses a Special Attack.

PASSIVE: Increase Energy Resistance by 1600 while Blocking.
FIGHT START: 100% chance to Regenerate 124.68 health over 10 seconds.
ALL ATTACKS: All Attacks have a 10% chance to place a Loa on their opponent, that lasts until removed by another effect. A Loa is a buff with no effects.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 50% chance to Envenom each of the opponent’s Buffs, Nullifying it, and applying a Poison dealing 207.5 Direct Damage over 20 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 50% chance to convert up to 3 Loa, Nullifying them and placing either a Buff on himself or a Debuff on the Opponent, based on current Combo Meter.
Even Combo: All of Voodoo's attacks gain a 50% chance to burn 2.5% of his opponent's Power, Converting 525% of Power burnt into Energy Damage, lasting 15 seconds.
Odd Combo: Target leaks 35% of their power, over 10 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance of applying Power Leech to the target stealing 45% of Max Power over 20 seconds.
When the Power Leech ends for any reason, Doctor Voodoo gains an equivalent Power Gain Buff.
